title: Real-World Project-Based Problem-Solving Learning: Web Development Design Utilizing PBL (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and team project experience
context.additional_context: Focus on enhancing autonomy and collaboration through real projects with VUCA characteristics. Applying the 3 Square Model to manage learning efficiency in hybrid environments.

learning_goals: Analyze real client requirements and draft a project scope definition document
Collaborate with team members from diverse backgrounds to design decision-making processes and role allocations
Apply PBL methodologies to prototype web-based solutions and derive improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
